data.title: Jasper Place Apartments
data.meta_description: Rent at Jasper Place Apartments in Council Bluffs, IA! These apartments are conveniently located near fine dining. Call us!
data.text:
One look at our spacious floor plans and it's easy to see how Jasper Place is different from other apartments for rent in Council Bluffs. With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we’re certain there’s one that’s just right for you. Emanating the different varieties of the Jasper stone itself, our apartment community offers a selection of different floor plans that are beautifully unique. Named for some of the most vibrant types of Jasper, each floor plan is thoughtfully designed to complement any lifestyle. Browse our unique and spacious options to find the perfect layout for you.

Pricing and availability subject to change. Please contact Leasing Office for pricing quote. $10 per Month Risk Mitigation Fee Applies to All Leases.

Check Availability

We've set up a quick and easy way for you to pay your rent online so you can focus on the more important and fun things in life. Visit our Resident Portal and pay rent with a simple click of the button.

At Jasper Place Apartments, we pride ourselves in having a management team equal to the extremely high standards of our community. We strive to be a resource in any way we can for you, whether you’re already a resident or are thinking about becoming one. Please don’t hesitate to reach out to us! We look forward to welcoming you home.
